Class CandidatePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • CandidatePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class CandidatePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This class provides a GUI for accessing the CandidateManager data structure It provides actions to read information from a file and to clear the fields
    Author:
    Adam Holt
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
